name: Meat Grinder MK-12
line2: 850W power, 220V/50Hz, capacity 150kg/day. Stainless steel body with 6mm & 8mm plates. Compact design, easy to clean, suitable for small kitchens or butcher shops.

name: Meat Grinder MK-22
line2: 1100W motor, 220V/50Hz, productivity 220kg/day. Equipped with 6mm & 8mm plates. Full stainless steel frame, durable and stable for restaurant or deli use.

name: 1.1kW Meat Grinder and Fish Paste Mixer
line1: 1.1kW Meat Grinder and Fish Paste Mixer (Ø22cm bowl)
line2: Made of stainless steel with 1.1kW copper motor, operates on 220V/50Hz. Grinds 1–2kg per batch. Includes 2 blades (grinding + stirring). Compact and efficient for home or small business use.

name: 5KG Meat and Fish Paste Mixer
line2: 3.5kW full-copper motor, 220V power. Stainless steel bowl (thickness 1.2mm), 2 mixing blades. Capacity 3–5kg per batch. Ideal for producing meat paste, sausages, or fish cakes in small factories.

name: Meat Grinder ATS-950
line2: 2.2kW motor, 220V power, 200kg/h output. Includes 4 blades and 4 plates (6–12mm). Cast aluminum housing, stainless steel auger. Heavy-duty machine for pork, beef, or chicken grinding.
